Package com.globaltcad.swingtree

Class Tab

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.globaltcad.swingtree.Tab
  • public class Tab
extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable data carrier exposing everything needed to configure a tab of a JTabbedPane. One can create instances of this through the UI.tab(String) factory method and then add them to instances of a UIForTabbedPane builder like so: 
    
      UI.tabbedPane()
      .add(UI.tab("one").add(UI.panel().add(..)))
      .add(UI.tab("two").withTip("I give info!").add(UI.label("read me")))
      .add(UI.tab("three").with(someIcon).add(UI.button("click me")))
